snippet: Having battled and overcome cancer, American Vicky Duval is just happy to grab any time on court she can....
lead_paragraph: Having battled and overcome cancer, American Vicky Duval is just happy to grab any time on court she can.

headline.print_headline: Cancer Survivor Duval Delights in Role as Serena Stand-In
headline.main: Cancer Survivor Duval Delights in Role as Serena Stand-In
